name: scorm2004-comprehensive-test
description: Comprehensive SCORM 2004 test course with resume, completion, and data tracking

scripts.dev: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.package: npm run build && npx package-scorm -i dist -o scorm2004-test.zip --title 'SCORM 2004 Comprehensive Test'
